segments.text: I see the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing right there, waiting for her share like it’s the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, and it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, but she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall, but I can’t help but laugh at how reckless he’s being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to trust him completely, even though he’s about to crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever figure out what’s happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me laugh.
segments.speaker: PAR
